Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Caffeine did not alter plasma MHPG levels in either the healthy subjects or patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Patients |
| Healthy subjects |

In this paragraph, "patients" and "healthy subjects" are the entities that can be considered as diseases or health conditions. The paragraph is stating that caffeine did not affect the plasma MHPG levels in these two groups.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Patients |

In this paragraph, "patients" is the only entity that can be considered as a disease or health condition. The term "healthy subjects" is not a disease, but rather a description of a group of individuals who do not have the disease or condition being studied. Therefore, it should not be included in the table.
